item.title: All systems taken offline for Jetstream2 maintenance
item.description: Pending - Dendra shut down gracefully. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform maintenance and come back online so Dendra system services can be started. (11:00 UTC — Jan 6)
item.content: Pending - Dendra shut down gracefully. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform maintenance and come back online so Dendra system services can be started. (11:00 UTC — Jan 6)

item.title: [Resolved] All systems taken offline for Jetstream2 repair
item.description: Pending - Dendra shut down due to hosting provider storage system issues. Jetstream2 has been experiencing several ongoing system issues after the weekend power outage. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform repair. (21:30 UTC — Apr 16) Resolved - Jetstream2 patch applied. Dendra system services have been restarted and validation underway. (00:34 UTC — Apr 17)
item.content:
Pending - Dendra shut down due to hosting provider storage system issues. Jetstream2 has been experiencing several ongoing system issues after the weekend power outage. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform repair. (21:30 UTC — Apr 16)

Resolved - Jetstream2 patch applied. Dendra system services have been restarted and validation underway. (00:34 UTC — Apr 17)

item.title: [Resolved] All systems taken offline for Jetstream2 maintenance
item.description: Pending - Dendra shut down gracefully. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform maintenance and come back online so Dendra system services can be started. (09:30 UTC — Apr 14) Resolved - Jetstream2 maintenance completed. Power outage was longer than expected. Data center was switched to diesel power due to continued Duke Energy outage. Private networking issues are still being investigated by Jetstream2 team. Dendra system service have been restarted and validation underway.
item.content:
Pending - Dendra shut down gracefully. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform maintenance and come back online so Dendra system services can be started. (09:30 UTC — Apr 14)

Resolved - Jetstream2 maintenance completed. Power outage was longer than expected. Data center was switched to diesel power due to continued Duke Energy outage. Private networking issues are still being investigated by Jetstream2 team. Dendra system service have been restarted and validation underway. (05:52 UTC — Apr 15)
